about_the_game:
"Light Devourer" is a pixel-art, top-down action-adventure game featuring exhilarating combat, highly explorative map design, and a dark fantasy narrative. As the Light Devourer, the player roams through this challenging world.

Exciting Combat Experience

Swing your weapons and dash continuously, or unleash powerful skills after accumulating rage. Players need to formulate tactics based on their weapons and equipped skills while managing health and stamina to avoid falling into a disadvantageous situation!

Challenging Boss Battles

Engage in battles with powerful enemies in mysterious regions! Bosses have higher health and damage, with varied attack patterns and skills. Find their weaknesses, learn their attack patterns, and gradually overcome each challenging boss.

Customizable Combat Style

Players can freely choose from a variety of upgrade options, whether to become a high-strength warrior with strong poise-breaking ability, a high-agility assassin with high critical hit chances, or a high-intelligence mage with powerful skill damage. Customize your stats and select the most suitable weapons and skills to equip yourself with powerful combinations!

Explore an Intricately Interwoven World

The world is structured like a tower, with many floors featuring diverse environments. Players can move vertically between floors using elevators or quickly teleport between activated light filaments, traveling from one light thread location to another. From the dark and damp underground to the ruins of shattered castles, and even to the mysterious and majestic sky city, explore this world full of mysteries, uncover its secrets, and learn more about yourself along the way.

Why have you come here? Kill all enemies and devour all the light.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
